column4: which programming language would you recoommend for beginners?
pascal is a good teaching language
use imageshack to make a url
its a netsplit
pipe command outputs and files to it and it will make a URL
saves having to use a browser to pastebin files, waaaaaay faster
I'll try
should I typ: ping 8.8.8.8  ?
yes
I think it works, but who can I stop the 'ping command' ?
press CTRL+C
It prints "138 packets transmitted, 138 received, 0% packet loss, time 137230ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 48.559/51.745/100.955/4.635 ms"
if you are getting replies then run:  echo "nameserver 8.8.8.8" | sudo tee /etc/resolv.conf      does the web now work?
no it doesn't work
do you use a proxy to get online?
no
if you run:  cat /etc/resolv.conf     does it just have the line I gave without the quotes?
If i type:  cat /etc/resolv.conf  it prints:      # Generated by NetworkManager nameserver 192.168.2.1
ok, run:  gksudo gedit /etc/resolv.conf      and change 192.168.2.1 to 8.8.8.8     save the new file, close gedit and try the web (I assume gnome desktop)
I changed but web is still not working. (I got unity as desktop (ubuntu 11.10))
unity isnt a desktop, its a shell. You are using gnome desktop
sorry my fault I'm a newbie sorry
you'll learn :)
